Name: Momisette
Instructions: POUR pastis and almond syrup into glass. Serve with bottle of sparkling water so the customer can dilute to their own taste. Lastly, add ice to fill glass.
Review: Complex balance of anise, almond and liquorice.
History: A traditional French drink, the name of which literally translates as 'tiny mummy'.
Nutrition: One serving of Momisette contains 100 calories
